ThingDef.label: pokemonName egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized Bulbasaur egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby Bulbasaur. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Bulbasaur
ThingDef.description: Its a pokemon, buy a pokedex or whatever.
